Our dependence on computers has increased tremendously. Right from running a school to a railway system or an aeroplane, we are depepndent on computers. Do you think, our lives are going to become more dependent on computers as technology advances? Is this dependence good for our overall development? Give reason.

 

The invention of computers was a revolutionary change in the world in any field. It is used in all the fields on daily basis like transportation, entertainment, business, organizations, education, banking and many more. It has made the work easy for humans and it also saves time. The increase in the usage of computers has increased with the advancement in computers with advanced features. Computers are now available in the form of laptops, notepads which are portable and can be carried anywhere. Dependency on computers has increased with the internet availability and connectivity. Computers have provided an ease to work as it can be more quick than human and can store the data efficiently. Computers have become an important part of our life as we are habituated in using them for all our everyday activity. For example, in super markets the billing system undergoes with the usage of computers and if they had to do the same without the computer it would become more difficult for them and would consume a lot of time.

Computers are enhanced techically by the intoduction of various features that would be an advantage to the users. Various softwares are available for storage and retrieval of data in computers like database management system which can store a huge amount of data and can retrieve the data which is necessary through data retrieval techniques. Oracle provides these softwares and launches the advanced versions of the software in the market. Intel deals in processors which are used to run the computers and it always launches the innovated processors on regular intervals with advanced features. Microsoft, another company which makes the software that is needed to run a system called windows. It has always innovated its software by providing the latest advanced software by using advanced technology to position itself in the market of computers.

The dependency on computers is proportional to enhancement in the technology. As the technology is rapidly innovated with the advancement in technology by providing various additional features in the field of computers, the ease of working has increased. Hence, the technology in advancing the computers plays a beneficial role in the development in any field by saving the time with much improvised work pattern. In future, more and more innovations will be done in this field which will lead to the development and will improve the standards of the work.
